name: MPEG Layer 3 Audio File
summary: Learn about .MPU files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: MPU files are the same as .MP3 files. If your program does not recognize MPU files, change their extension from ".mpu," to ".mp3" to play them.

description: Audio file saved in the MPEG (Moving Picture Experts Group) Layer 3 Audio Compressed audio format; contains sampled audio that may be compressed using different bit rates; may contain stereo, 16-bit, near-CD quality sound.
